summary: Shows damage, dirt, and coloured to be less yellow
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/12085-1-1330882775.png[/img][/center]

[color=cyan][size=\"3\"]Description[/size][/color]: 

This is an attempt to retexture all the bones in-game including skeletons and collectible dragonbones.  Each retexture was done to be relevant to type of bone such as the fresh dragon skeleton being whiter then bones which have had time to decay and become damaged, such as the skeleton enemies.

[color=cyan][size=\"3\"]Installation[/size][/color]: 

Drop the textures folder into your data directory, I recommend using a temporary folder to use a place to do the initial unpacking then copy the data to the right folder.  This way you can see which files to delete from the data folder when you want to uninstall.

[color=\"#00BFFF\"][size=\"3\"]Tools used[/size][/color]: 

Gimp 2.6
author: Ironman5000
